title: NO BROKER FEE! Commonwealth Avenue 1 Bedroom
map_address: Commonwealth Ave near Chestnut Hill Ave
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 41023425', 'Rent: $2,175 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', '- Available for 9/1/22.', '- No broker fee.', '- Across from the Green Line.', '- Hardwood flooring through out the apartment.', '- Great natural lighting.', '- Virtual tour available.', '- Will not last!', 'Tram: B Chiswick Road (0.06 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Chestnut Hill Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 501 Winship St @ Union St (0.45 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Reservoir (0.33 mi)', 'Tram: C Cleveland Circle (0.26 mi)', 'Tram: D Reservoir (0.35 mi)', 'Bus: 65 Washington St @ Euston St (0.48 mi)', '--------------------------------------------------------------------------', 'FEATURES', 'Elevator', 'Shopping Accessible', 'T Accessible', 'Val Temin', '6177845998', 'If you would like to take a look at additional apartment options please see below:', 'https://ygl.is/valvel-temin', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
